analysis.key_quote: Overall this rule change will destroy the well-working, apolitical, civil service we have come to rely on for the past 50 years.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a protected civil service to prevent politicization and corruption, highlighting concerns about due process and the merit-based system. It also warns of the potential loss of institutional knowledge and best practices, which further aligns with opposition to the rule.
